column2: "Remalia ne ba Peka n'afe a otsia duesuon no mu na Judahen Jotam ne ba Ahaz hyɛɛ ase dzii hen."
"Aber a Ahaz hyɛɛ ase dzii hen no na oedzi mfe eduonu; na odzii hen mfe duesia wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ɔannyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ n'EWURADZE Nyankopɔn enyiwa do
"Mbom ɔnantseew Israel ahemfo kwan do
column4: na ɔdze ne ba mpo bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column5: dɛ mbrɛ amanamamfo a EWURADZE tuu hɔn fii Israelmba enyim no hɔn atɔrmuadze tse."

column2: "Na ɔbɔɔ afɔr na ɔhyeew eduhuam wɔ mbea sorɔnsorɔm no do
"Nna Siriahen Rezin na Israelhen Peka
column3: Remalia ne ba no fowee baa Jerusalɛm dɛ wɔrobɔko: na wɔkɔr Ahaz ntuae
column4: na mbom woenntum enndzi no do nyim."

column2: "Aber no mu na Siriahen Rezin gyee Elat sanee maa Siria
column3: na ɔpaam Jewfo no fii Elat: na Siriafo no baa Elat

column2: "Nna Ahaz tuu abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Asiriahen Tiglat-pileser nkyɛn
column4: Meyɛ w'akowaa na wo ba: fow bra bɛgye me fi Siriahen
column5: na Israelhen a wɔasoɛr mo do yi nsamu."

column2: "Na Ahaz faa dwetɛ na sika a wohun no wɔ EWURADZE ne fie
column3: na ɔhen no ne fie akoradze mu
column4: na ɔsomae ma wɔdze kɛmaa Asiriahen no dɛ ayɛyɛdze."

column2: "Na Asiriahen no tsiee no: na Asiriahen no sii mu kɔr Damaskɔs do
column4: na ɔfaa no mu nkorɔfo no ndɔmmum kɔr Kir

column2: "Na ɔhen Ahaz sii mu kɔr Damaskɔs dɛ orikehyia Asiriahen Tiglat-pileser kwan
column3: na ohun afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ Damaskɔs no: na ɔhen Ahaz somae ma wɔdze afɔrmbukyia no su
column4: na no nsusudo dɛ mbrɛ ne yɛbea nyinara tse

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Uria sii afɔrmbukyia: dɛ mbrɛ dza ɔhen Ahaz somae ma wɔdze fi Damaskɔs no tse no
column3: dɛmara so na ɔsɔfo Uria yɛe dze tweɔɔn ɔba a ɔhen Ahaz fi Damaskɔs bae no."

column2: "Na aber a ɔhen no fi Damaskɔs bae na obohun afɔrmbukyia no
"Na ɔhyeew ne hyew afɔr na n'edziban afɔr
column4: na ɔdze n'asomdwee afɔr bɔgyaa no petsee afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na boran afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE enyim no
column3: oyii fii ɔdan no enyim dze fii n'afɔrmbukyia no na EWURADZE ne dan no ntamu
column4: na ɔdze kesii n'afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn wɔ kwaamu afamu."

column2: "Na ɔhen Ahaz hyɛɛ ɔsɔfo Uria
column4: Afɔrmbukyia kɛse no do na hyew anapa hyew afɔr
column8: ka asaase yi do ɔman nyinara hɔn ɔhyew afɔr
column10: na hɔn nom afɔr ho; na fa ɔhyew afɔr bɔgyaa no nyinara petse do: na boran afɔrmbukyia no dze onsi hɔ mma me

column2: "Dɛm na ɔsɔfo Uria yɛe
column3: dɛ mbrɛ dza ɔhen Ahaz hyɛe no tse nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔhen Ahaz twitwaa ndaka no ne nhyehyɛmu no
column3: na oyiyii eguarsɛn bo fii do; na oyii po no fii boran anantwi no a wɔwɔ n'ase no do
column4: na ɔdze kesii abosɛwee bi do."

column2: "Na ɔhen no nsumaa kwan a wɔyɛɛ no ɔdan no mu no
column3: na ɔhen no n'ahɛnee a ɔwɔ guado no
column4: ɔdanee kɔr EWURADZE ne fi no nkyɛn

column2: "Afei Ahaz no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Ahaz kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no kaa n'egyanom ho wɔ David kurow mu: na ne babanyin Hezekia dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
